resourceType.description: A person who is directly or indirectly involved in the provisioning of healthcare or related services.

active.description: Whether this patient's record is in active use

gender.description: The gender that the patient is considered to have for administration and record keeping purposes.

birthDate.description: The date of birth for the individual.

multi_datatype.description: Indicates if the individual is deceased or not.
Indicates if the individual is deceased or not.
